other_tests.findings: Hyperkeratosis, acanthosis, neutrophilic microabscesses in the epidermis, and a dense mixed inflammatory cell infiltrate in the dermis with focal multinucleated giant cells.
Hyperkeratosis, parakeratosis, irregular acanthosis, neutrophilic epidermal microabscesses, spongiform pustules, and a mononuclear perivascular infiltrate in the papillary dermis.
Intense acute and chronic inflammation in the stroma.
Weakly positive IgM for Chlamydia psittaci and Chlamydia pneumoniae suggesting probable cross-reactivity.
